mdRecord.dcterms:title: Scotts Store Building
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 659_Scotts Store 4, 4 prints taken of exterior and interior of Old Scott's Store, E. Main St., Floyd 1870 Scott Store, East Main St. Floyd. Owner operators S&W Samuel and Winfield Scott. Sustained a fire 1903, rebuilt. Went out of business ca 1916.
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
